name: The French Resistance
description: In this game, you play the leader of the French Resistance in 1944.  You need to gather intelligence for the allies, sabotage critical transport and communications infrastructure, and support a growing band of partisans.  Three resistance networks have recently agreed to work together to accomplish these goals:  The Communists, the Gaullists, and the Foreigners.  These three factions have very different visions of France's post war future, and they don't always get along.  Also, the Gestapo has a mole within your ranks.  He or she is disrupting your operations, compromising your cells, and getting your people killed.  Find the mole before it is too late!
